timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: So this will take the value 6 in our ci? I think we should set this explicitly in the scripts, just like the forkCount. It helps us reason about this for each specific case
timeline.author: korthout

timeline.message:
chore(parent): enable junit parallel tests

- junit5 parallel tests are enabled with profile parallel-tests
- default configuration is based on number of cores divided by 2
- parallel tests are opt in based on annotations
- junit thread count can be overriden via the property junitThreadCount
